p: The 15 experimental combinations ( Table 2) established in the DOE for the development of topical 4-MU formulation were applied to the dorsal skin of male and female 6- to 10-week-old WT C57BL/6J mice. HA ELISA-like assay was performed on harvested skin samples from those mice (normalized to total protein in the skin), and results for each condition are shown in Table 4.
